PROJECT 
 
PROJECT: 
 Design & Fabrication of THREE WAY TIPPER UNLOADING USING 
SINGLE PISTON. 
Abstract: In the three-way tipper, operators can reduce their unloading time 
because it eliminates the need to back up, maneuver and position the equipment 
just to get the contents to land in the right spot. 
 Design and Fabrication of FORMING TOOL FOR BERTH READING 
LIGHT COVER IN LOCOMOTIVE AC COACHES. 
Abstract: Design and fabrication of inverted solid forming die in which 
operation is generally along a curved axis rather than a straight axis the shape of 
the punch and die is reproduce in the metal.Forming die are typical in nature since 
they involve geometry, boundary and material non-linearity. Drawings part 
involves many parameters like punch and dies radius, clearance, lubrication, 
blank holding force etc. 
 Studies on Integrated Solar Dryer For Fruits Drying With PV 
Power Generation And Energy Auditing On Dairy Industry.
